content: la vonne s knot just knits spring flowers neckpiece 1st flower motif chain 8 slip_stitch into first chain to form ring row 1 3ch counts as 1dc into ring work 1dc 6ch 3dc 5x 6ch 1dc slip_stitch into 3rd chain at beg of round row 2 * chain 1 into next 6 chain arch work single_crochet half_double_crochet 7dc half_double_crochet single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet sl st in next double_crochet repeat from * 5 more times placing last slip_stitch into 3rd chain at beg of previous row fasten_off place marker or pin on this motif second motif * work 1st motif completing 4 out of 6 petals then *chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet 1 slip_stitch in next double_crochet in next 6ch arch work single_crochet half_double_crochet 4dc sl t in 4th double_crochet on any petal of first flower motif going back to 2nd or working motif finish petal 3dc half_double_crochet single_crochet * repeat from * to * once chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet put last slip_stitch into 3rd chain at beg of previous row fasten_off third motif work 4 petals than to 4th double_crochet of petal 5 join to next free petal on flower 2 finish petal continue working in established pattern to 4th double_crochet of last petal join to next free petal on flower 2 finish flower fasten_off back ties make 2 chain 40 on flower 1 skip 1 free petal join to 4th double_crochet of petal with a single_crochet turn and slip_stitch back 10 chain then chain 10 more attach with a single_crochet to 4th double_crochet of next free petal turn and slip_stitch back all the way back to beg of chain weave in ends optional put a bead on end of chain and knot below bead work tie for flower 3 same as on flower 1 thank you for you order should you have any problems with this pattern please feel free to contact me at angela best@sympatico ca ©angela best2005 spring flowers neck piece http //lavonneknotjustknits com 1
